entry.title: Version 0.1.0 released
entry.summary:
Version 0.1.0 has just been released to NPM. As this is 0.* versioned this is to be considered a development version and in other words, unstable.

We will work towards getting a stable 1.0.0 release as soon as possible. If you'd like to help please d...
